# Course Name
Developing Data Products

## Course Project
Shiny Application

An interactive Shiny application is presented here. The application predicts Fuel Efficiency of a car given a set of displacement, no of cylinder and weight. The application is a shiny implementation of R Tutorial available  [here](http://varianceexplained.org/RData/code/code_lesson3/).
To run the shiny application download/clone the project and then run runApp() after switching over to the project directory.
